title: Lysistrata (version 3)
description: The women of Athens are sick of the  Peloponnesian war that has dragged on for year after year after  year, causing great hardship to everyone.  They decide to deny the men sex until they agree to make peace, using the one thing that perhaps men enjoy more than killing each other.  Does it work? Listen and find out.   This comedy by Aristophanes was first performed in 411 BC

sections.title: Scene I:  In a public square at Athens
Scene II:  Afterwards, before the gates of the Acropolis,
Scene III: Within the precincts of the citadel.
